message.content:
cs.DC, cs.DB, cs.SE, cs.DL, cs.IR. 

The paper discusses the design of selective information dissemination systems using the publish/subscribe paradigm, which involves routing information and requests based on their content throughout a wide-area network of brokers. This topic is closely related to distributed computing (cs.DC) and database systems (cs.DB), as well as software engineering (cs.SE) and information retrieval (cs.IR) since the paper deals with issues related to content routing and semantics. Additionally, the paper mentions the use of syntax-based content routing, which is a common technique in natural language processing (cs.CL), but this is not the main focus of the paper. Therefore, cs.CL is less likely to be a relevant sub-category.
